references.paper_title: AMEX: Android multi-annotation expo dataset for mobile GUI agents
references.reason: This paper introduces a dataset and benchmark specifically designed for evaluating mobile GUI agents, directly relevant to the core topic of the main paper.

references.paper_title: Androidworld: A dynamic benchmarking environment for autonomous agents
references.reason: This paper presents a dynamic evaluation platform for Android GUI agents, which is a key area of focus and comparison for the main paper's proposed A3 platform.

references.paper_title: On the effects of data scale on UI control agents
references.reason: This study analyzes the impact of dataset size on GUI agent performance, providing insights relevant to the discussions of dataset limitations in the main paper.

references.paper_title: Benchmarking mobile device control agents across diverse configurations
references.reason: This paper offers a comparative analysis of different mobile GUI agent benchmarks, enriching the contextual understanding of the main paper's contribution.

references.paper_title: Understanding the weakness of large language model agents within a complex android environment
references.reason: This work investigates the challenges and limitations of large language models in controlling mobile GUIs, providing valuable insights for evaluating mobile GUI agents and directly related to the challenges addressed in A3.
